The VAT Calculator Chrome Extension is an essential tool designed to help small business owners streamline their invoicing process. With this extension, you can effortlessly and accurately calculate Value Added Tax (VAT) for various countries, saving you valuable time and minimizing hassle.

As a small business owner dealing with international transactions, you know how crucial it is to have accurate VAT calculations. Our extension provides a comprehensive list of countries, allowing you to easily select the right VAT percentage for each transaction.

Simplify your invoicing workflow and ensure compliance with international tax regulations. Whether you're managing invoices for your online business or handling transactions as a frequent traveler, the VAT Calculator Chrome Extension will be your go-to solution.

No more manual calculations or tedious online searches for VAT rates. Experience the convenience of automatic updates and seamless VAT calculations, tailored to your business needs. Plus, the extension remembers your last selected country, providing a personalized and efficient experience.


Key Features:

Select from a comprehensive list of countries to get the default VAT percentage.
Input the price without VAT to instantly calculate the VAT amount.
Input the price with VAT to calculate the price without VAT.
Conveniently switch between different VAT calculation options using radio buttons.
VAT percentages are automatically updated based on the selected country.
The extension remembers your last selected country for a seamless experience.
Using the VAT Calculator Chrome Extension is simple and intuitive. Just select your country, enter the price, and let the extension handle the rest. No more manual calculations or searching for VAT rates online.

Join thousands of small business owners who have already optimized their VAT calculations. Download the VAT Calculator Chrome Extension now and stay ahead in the world of international transactions.
